name: Solomon Reed
description: Solomon Reedis aSolo/Lawmanand a major character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Reed is a tall, dark and masculine individual of African descent with short hair, goatee with a connected mustache (a circle beard), and visible cyberware in his temples and neck. He tends to wear a long, dark leather jacket with a red lining inside and a shirt underneath. He wears a long necklace with a circular pendant. In 2079, Reed seemingly has more cyberware in his hands and arms; with his fingers completely replaced by chrome. Solomon Reed was a member of theNUSA SpecOps. His unit, includingMaine, was...
